Posts.Content: How kind of you to take the time to help so many on the forums while you are fighting this battle. My best to you and your husband, and all the kids and grandchildren.
Posts.Signature: Daughter of late father with Primary CNS Lymphoma and mother with Stage IIIB Rectal cancer. Mom finished surgery/chemo/radiation. NED on scans (9/13, 6/14, 6/15). Dad received six rounds of high dose methotrexate (inpatient), which failed. He survived six months from diagnosis. http://sunrainlilies.wordpress.com/
Posts.Title: M husband's psa just went higher.
